main event: Two round objects were observed flying and appearing yellowish-red while moving back and forth before disappearing.
interesting points: The objects were observed using binoculars, The sighting occurred at night around 2030, The objects moved in a zigzag pattern, A military report indicated a bright luminous object hovering for about 15 minutes, The report concluded that the objects were probably meteors.
witness description: A military officer who was checking weather instruments
